title: Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring, Newly Renovated Apartment Homes*
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Villas at West Ridge!', 'Come home to quiet, comfortable living and generous amenities at Villas at West Ridge in Lithia Springs, Georgia.', 'Our friendly community offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes for rent in five inviting floor plans, all featuring kitchens with frost-free refrigerators with ice makers, bedrooms with ceiling fans, roomy closets and plenty of storage space.', 'Some homes offer patios/balconies and attached garages.', 'Villas at West Ridge is located in Lithia Springs, Georgia and is a short drive to Interstate 20, with quick access to downtown Atlanta, C-Tran and Marta public transit.', 'Premier shopping at Arbor Place Mall and Shopping Centers on Chapel Hill and much more!', 'University of West Georgia, West Central Tech., Mercer and Strayer are only a short commute from our community along with major industries such as Lockheed Martin and Dobbins Air Force Base.', 'Here you can expect to rent a home in a community that is warm, inviting, attentive, and convenient to all that Lithia Springs living has to offer.', 'A new life of luxury is moments away at Villas at West Ridge on Lee Road.', 'Call today to schedule a tour of your new apartment home in the heart of Lithia Springs.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 10', 'OR Text', '10', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1306 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- FF Refrigerator with Icemaker', '- Separate Dining Area', '- Crown Molding', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Built-In Computer Desk', '- Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Built-In Desks', '- Private Patio or Balcony', '- Prewired for Intrusion Alarm', '- Window Blinds', '- Garden Tubs*', '- Newly Renovated Apartment Homes*', '- Full-Size Washer/Dryer Connections', '- Open Breakfast Bar and Pantry', '- Washer/Dryer Available*', '- Pre-Cable Ready', '- Nine-foot Ceilings', '- Hardwood Floors*', '- Attached Garages w/ Private Entry*', '- Walk-In Closets', '- 9 Ft.', 'Ceilings w/Crown Molding', '*in select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Playground', '- Saline Resort-Style Swimming Pool', '- Picnic Area with Grills', '- Sprinklered Buildings', '- Laundry Facility', '- 12 Detached Garages', '- Car Care Center with Vacuum', '- Controlled Access Gates', '- 32 Attached Direct Access Garages', '- Central Trash Compactor', '- Resident Business Center', '- Fitness Center', '- Central Mail Stations', '- Resident Clubhouse', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome 2 pets (cats/dogs) per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet deposit.', 'Pet rent is $10 per month.', 'There is a weight limit of 40 pounds per pet.', 'Please see a Leasing Associate to learn more about weight and breed restrictions.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'Villas at West Ridge', '7850 Lee Road, Lithia Springs, GA, 30122', 'axsIuBvL3']
